text: Tap tɨmel gɨpal okok nab kɨlop ayaŋ aplan jakɨl mɨdeb. Tap tɨtɨmel gɨl, tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl gos ak nɨŋɨd, monmon gɨlɨg binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨpal. Tap kɨli kuŋay okok yad tek mɨdobɨkop agɨl nɨŋɨd, chɨp paklɨl, mɨlɨk yapek penpen agɨlɨg mɨdɨl, takaw yepɨs agɨl, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgun agɨl gos nepal. Pen nep agup yɨp agup agɨl,
